messages.content: As your future MP I will strive to uphold our policies, some of which are detailed below:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase personal allowance to the level of full time minimum wage earnings of approximately £13,000.
Leave the EU and take back control of our borders and save £8 Billion pound annually.
Ensure the NHS continues to be free at point of delivery. Invest another 3 Billion pound into the NHS.
Stop Health Tourism, saving approximately 2 Billion pound annually.

issues.brexitEurope: Leave the EU and take back control of our borders and save £8 Billion pound annually.
issues.health: Ensure the NHS continues to be free at point of delivery. Invest another 3 Billion pound into the NHS. Stop Health Tourism, saving approximately 2 Billion pound annually.
issues.immigration: Leave the EU and take back control of our borders and save £8 Billion pound annually.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your future MP I will strive to uphold our policies, some of which are detailed below:

contactInformation.address: Marion Mason, 53 Manchester Close, Stevenage, Herts, SG1 4TQ
